selectPermissionsForm.facilityPermission: Kodi muzigwiritsa ntchito bwanji Kolibri? (Mungathe kusintha ma seting'i amenewa nthawi ina)
Dziwani zambiri zokhudza ma seting'i amenewa
selectPermissionsForm.adminManagedSetupD: Za masukulu komanso malo ena ophunirira
selectPermissionsForm.selfManagedSetupDe: Za m'malaibulale, malo osungira ana amasiye, malo othandizira anthu kusintha khalidwe, malo a achinyamata, malabotale a makompyuta komanso malo ena omwe si masukulu
selectPermissionsForm.informalSetupDescr: Zokhudza maphunziro ana ndi makolo, kuphunzitsa ana panyumba kapena maphunziro owonjezera
selectPermissionsForm.disabledUserAccoun: Adimini ayenera kupanga ma akaunti a anthu onse
selectPermissionsForm.enabledAccountEdit: Munthu aliyense angathe kusintha zinthu zina pa akaunti yake
selectPermissionsForm.disabledAccountEdi: Munthu aliyense sangathe kusintha zinthu zina pa akaunti yake
selectPermissionsForm.enabledUserPasswor: Munthu aliyense akhoza kulowa pa akaunti yake opanda pasiwedi
selectPermissionsForm.disabledUserSelfSi: Adimini ayenera kupanga ma akaunti a anthu onse
superuserCredentialsForm.adminAccountCre: Akauntiyi izikuthandizani kusintha zinthu zina za Bungwe lanu komanso zinthu za pachipangizochi.
superuserCredentialsForm.nameFieldEmptyE: N'zosatheka kusiya osalemba dzina lanu lonse
superuserCredentialsForm.usernameFieldEm: N'zosatheka kusiya osalemba dzina lanu lolowera
superuserCredentialsForm.usernameCharact: Dzina lolowera liyenera kukhala ndi zilembo, manambala komanso ma andasikolo
facilityNameForm.facilityNamingFormDescr: "Sukulu" ndi malo amene mungaike pulogalamu imeneyi pa kompyuta monga pa sukulu kapena malo ena ophunzirira
facilityNameForm.facilityNameFieldMaxLen: Dzina la Bungwe silingakhale ndi mawu oposa 100
defaultLanguageForm.languageFormHeader: Sankhani chilankhulo chimene mukufuna kugwiritsa ntchito pa Kolibri
onboardingErrorPage.errorPageSubheader: Pangani tcheki ngati seva yanu ili yolumikiza kenako muyesenso.
onboardingErrorPage.errorPageAdditionalG: Ngati mwayesanso koma sizikutheka, zimitsani ndi kuyatsanso seva yanu kenako mupange lifuleshi tsamba lino.
onboardingLoadingPage.loadingPageSubhead: Chonde dikiranibe. Kuika kungatenge maminitsi ambiri
